title: Get all duels of the logged user
name: GetAllDuels

permission.name: LoggedIn
permission.title: Logged user access only
permission.description: The user has to be logged in to use this endpoint (see Authentication)

title: Get a duel by its ID
name: GetDuel

Success 200.description: true if the duel is not finished yet
The title of this type of question
The question subject - if the round is the current one, or finished
The wording of the question - if the round is the current one, or finished
The list of answers - if the round is the current one, or finished
Index of the good answer - if the round is played by the user
Index of the user answer - if the round is played by the user
Index of the opponent's answer - if the round is played by the user & the opponent

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
     "id" : 42,
     "inProgress" : true,
     "currentRound" : 2,
     "opponent" : "jjgoldman",
     "userScore" : 3,
     "opponentScore" : 6,
     "rounds" : [
                    [
                      {
                        "type": 3,
                        "title" : "1 système - 4 molécules",
                        "subject": "ANTIBIOTIQUE",
                        "wording": "Quelle molécule appartient au système 'ANTIBIOTIQUE' ?"
                        "answers": ["TELBIVUDINE", "PYRAZINAMIDE", "RITONAVIR", "TINIDAZOLE"],
                        "goodAnswer": 1,
                        "userAnswer" : 0,
                        "opponentAnswer" : 1
                      },
                      {
                        "type": 3,
                        "title" : "1 système - 4 molécules",
                        "subject": "ANTIVIRAL",
                        "wording": "Quelle molécule appartient au système 'ANTIVIRAL' ?"
                        "answers": ["CEFIXIME", "SPIRAMYCINE", "RILPIVIRINE", "ALBENDAZOLE"],
                        "goodAnswer": 2,
                        "userAnswer" : 1,
                        "opponentAnswer" : 3
                      },
                      ...
                    ],
                    [
                      {
                        "type": 2,
                        "title" : "1 molécule - 4 classes"
                        "subject": "ZANAMIVIR",
                        "wording": "À quelle classe appartient la molécule 'ZANAMIVIR' ?"
                        "answers": [
                          "INHIBITEURS DE NEURAMINISASE", 
                          "INHIBITEUR POLYMERASE NS5B", 
                          "PHENICOLES", 
                          "OXAZOLIDINONES"
                        ],
                        "goodAnswer": 0,
                        "userAnswer" : 0,
                      },...
                    ],
                    [
                      {
                        "type" : 4,
                        "title" : "1 molécule - 4 systèmes"
                      },
                      ...
                    ]
                    ...
                  ]
}
